column4: Had that problem on a friends HP DV9K, found a fix for it on www.ubuntuforums.org. Search for "cannot access tty"
gimme a few, I'll see if I can track it down for you...
found what you need, follow this link;  http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=421588&highlight=cannot+access+tty+gutsy
